posts.post_title: SOLD: T206 Ty Cobb Green Portrait PSA 1.5

Making this card available. Card has perfect centering, great eye appeal and deep green color. Tough to find this card centered with deep green background. 

$5750 Net, add 3% for GS *SOLD*
